description:
Al gets more than he bargains for when he rescues a young girl from her assailants; she’s the daughter of the Demon King, and she needs Al’s help to save demon kind!
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Der Bauer und das Wiedersehen im Schloss des Dämonenkönigs
Le fermier et le monde des démons
The Farmer and the Reunion at the Demon King Castle
